'''Chris Hansen''' is a medical examiner who came out when [[Susan (When I Get to the Border)|Susan]] died.

==History==
Chris was called to the scene when [[Susan (When I Get to the Border)|Susan]] died on the side of the road after her ectopic pregnancy ruptured, causing hemorrhaging. He asked Addison and Bailey to tell him what had happened and Addison chafed at his questioning.

==Career==
Chris is a medical examiner.
